positive.review: msm is a mobile port that's functional, fun and easy to get into. the game really shines through its creature collecting, base building and social aspect. with lots of islands featuring scaling upgrade costs and constant timed monsters in rotation, there is a very complete endgame present. this makes for countless hours spent across short sessions.
I love this game because I can play it in the background without having to worry about it too much. Plus who does not like to collect cool monsters?
This game is genuinely really fun. I mean, look at me, I've played for 143 hours! Although my opinion doesn't really matter since I'm just a dumb autistic kid who likes to see monsters go "BUM"

This game is pretty awesome, only complaint i have is the breeding times...

But its really good and i would recommend it.
Really fun game. I first installed it as a joke and then got addicted
I place monster, they sing, I laugh and clap my hands & feet together while slapping my belly in glee. game is good ja
It takes a while but is a great game if you want something to just check up on every now and then (waiting times are pretty long)

my daughter loves this game, but I wish pricing was better for what they are offering or receiving more diamonds some way in event type or daily mission that give you some everyday. need more diamonds
this game is very good and addicting to play, but i wish it was a little easier to make diamonds. WOULD RECCOMEND
I've had a blast the last few years getting back into this game after playing it on my kindle when I was a kid. 10/10 game with amazing music with good feels and satisfying gameplay.

My Singing Monsters has been surprisingly addictive. I initially restarted this game on PC after playing on mobile a long time ago. Although the game is simple at its core, the resource management side of the game, alongside the long collection grind makes it more than the childish game. As someone who refuses to move on from a game before doing everything (achievements, decorating, all additional content), this game has not felt like a chore whatsoever as it requires minimal playtime (when you have done the basic tasks you can simply log off).

I would not recommend spending any money in game, as it is simply more fun to manage your resources, only having to log in occasionally (so you shouldn't burn out/overplay the game). Even if you do spend money, I would still strongly recommend limiting yourself to the cheaper seasonal deals, as the currency you buy definitely isn't worth what you spend for it.

Overall, I would recommend this game if you're looking for a low-commitment game to play here and there (despite being an unusual choice). 

Have fun!

This game is honestly way more addictive than it has any right to be. The way each monster adds its own sound and the whole island slowly turns into a full song is just‚Ä¶ super satisfying. It‚Äôs creative, weird in the best way, and has that ‚Äòcheck back every few hours‚Äô loop that keeps you hooked.
The art style is fun, the music system is clever, and unlocking new monsters never stops being exciting. If you like chill collection games with personality, this one‚Äôs a classic for a reason
really fun game to listen to monsters that are not in horror games and just sing as well as looking at monsters that aren't terrifying
very good songs and updates almost weekly which makes the game fun cause theres always a new monster you can get
This game is fun until you just breed and then you wait for a long time and it gets kinda boring

This game has been one of the best games that i have played during my childhood and i really enjoyed the mammot character the most, he feels INSIDE me if you know what i mean. Everytime i hear him do his iconic "BUM" i just want him to do some things to my "bum" if you dont get what im trying to say is that i want him to do things to my ass maybe inside maybe outside just do something man im NEEDING pleasure PLEASE
cool and good game very based gigachads
awesome game if you are super busy, i usually log in for maybe 15-20 minutes once or twice a day and then i can go back to being productive.

Brings back so much nostalgia, I love this game. It's pretty relaxing and has good music, I love the monster designs. I will say there's a lot of waiting around for monsters to breed and hatch, and buying monsters with gems would takes weeks if not more to be able to do. The mines only give you 1 diamond a day, and otherwise the only other way you can make sure you get diamonds is by spending real money. A good bit of monsters require diamonds, and a lot of diamonds for how few you can get. That's really the only thing I dislike, it's still a good game though
this is an amazing game and i would really recommend playing its not fun at the start and needs patience but once you get the hang of it its amazing!
Good artstyle. Updates verry often for a game from 2012. Also has really god music. It's a must play. kbye
Nice calm game whare you can make music using fun cirriters!

Love the game especially while playing it with my young kids. I do not like how in order to get all monsters you have to pay for them and over time it isn't cheap. The wait times for hatching are also incredibly long. I would much rather have a one time payment version of the game and receive all monsters through some sort of game achievement and have lowered wait times. The game is attractive to young kids who will definitely be asking for real life dollars to keep playing.
I have been playing this game since it came out with my uncle but then when we got separetad this game really helped me to miss him less.Over all LOVE THIS GAME I RECOMEND IT TO EVERYONE!!!
A favorite old classic, sounds better than modern music!

This game is great... But it would be greater if it had BeMeeBeth X Druisdom yaoi!

I think I like this game? I've made different tools to keep track of whatever I'm doing, currently making a cheat sheet for breeding times and best combos for all the monsters in the game [on hold]. I really enjoy just listening to (most of) the songs/islands. You probably could play a maximum of a second of any song and I would be able to name the island without fail, along with singing/humming the remainder. :D

Whenever a new Island gets released (which is surprisingly often, at least this year) I at first am unsure about whether I like it or not. The new gameplay mechanics feel confusing and annoyingly rng based at first (and still do), but since every new monster gives a completely new layer to the songs I am encouraged to keep at it. Though sometimes it literally takes months to get that single last one remaining.

I truly hate the way epics and rares are time sensitive things[spoiler], but with the addition of the mirror Paironormal Island giving wildcards, grinding for rare / epic Wubboxes ect. box monsters can now be more painlessly (than spending diamonds) skipped past by just waiting. [/spoiler]

If you plan on trying this game out, and come to "love" it like I have, be prepared to spend some money for QOL features. I recommend buying whatever the cheapest item in the store is, during some sort of deal (like double the diamonds than "regular", or for cheaper). For me, it happened to be like 2-3‚Ç¨, but I have not seen those deals in like a year++ so the cheapest will most likely be roughly 5‚Ç¨. I would not be still playing this game without the collect all and retry breeding/baking buttons.

i liked the singing and the singing when you first get into the game its like shoom bugala  shoom bugala bum bum
its a good game
Honestly its just a trend game, it was fun for a bit but progression takes a lot of fucking time.
peak for the amount of money i spent to get this game, now they're foreclosing my house and repossessing my car ever since i paid to play this game. Worth it.
cool game, addictive honestly lol

My Singing Monsters is easy to understand and fun to play, even without spending money. It‚Äôs a relaxing and joyful part of your day during which your only worry is how to breed all the monsters. Absolutely delightful, 10/10.
I play this on my phone more than steam, but it's addicting and fun and way less p2w then other games like it (ahem dragon City)

These little monsters have kidnapped me and trapped me in their world since the release of Magical Sanctum. Fortunately I don't mind.

In all seriousness It's crazy that this game from 2012 has gotten so many updates and so much love over the years.
PS Vita version not relevant anymore? Now all versions can get G'joob and Yawstrich! You know what? EVERY Natural Island gets a Mystical monster! Screw it, MYTHICAL ISLAND WITH A NEW SONG AND EVEN MORE NEW MONSTERS YOU CAN BREED!
The fact that every island has a unique song and each of the monsters that inhabit that island are instruments that play and/or sing that song that you can listen to in-game makes My Singing Monsters one of the most memorable creature collector games.

Yeah, there's microtransations for stuff that's mainly just cosmetic and waiting for breeding and hatching unless you want to pay real money for the in-game currencies (it IS a mobile game after all), but as someone who hasn't spent a dime so far, I'm very proud of my progress.

1000/1O
I‚Äôve been playing this game since I was a kid, and it still holds a special place in my heart. Over the years, its world has remained just as magical and immersive as the first time I experienced it. The gameplay feels nostalgic yet surprisingly timeless, proving how well it was designed. Even now, I can remember the excitement I felt learning its mechanics and uncovering its secrets for the first time. The characters and story have grown with me, leaving a lasting emotional impact. Every time I revisit it, I‚Äôm hit with a wave of memories that make the experience even richer. The soundtrack, especially, brings back the sense of wonder I had as a child. Despite all the new games I‚Äôve played, few have matched the charm and creativity of this classic. It‚Äôs one of those rare titles that feels better each time I return to it. Overall, this game is a nostalgic treasure that continues to shape my love for gaming.

If you want, I can rewrite it to fit the specific game you were talking about‚Äîjust tell me which one!

get the band together. my favorite is the ethereal monster called ghazt. the soounds are pleasing. you can mute monsters that sound like your little cousin playing the trombone if you want. the songs are premade per island, with some islands being customizable, which makes the game more approachable to people like me that were the little cousins horrendously playing the trombone at 12yo. There are many an advertisement/pop-up. However, you can just sit and vibe to some music. You can play for free and get everything enjoyable about the game. You can do a tribal island with friends, hand selecting which creatures to put on the island. Oh, that reminds me that the islands have specific monsters available to them. Which means you get variety on the songs and music that you explore with time. This is not a 2hr game. This is a 10 minutes a day thing that you come back to every once in a while. You watch as your islands becomes more complete.

I think this is one of those games everybody's heard or played a little bit of it back when mobile app games were popping off hard like Angry Birds. It was a fun yet novel distraction that was really unique for the time, being a sort of gacha game where you gather and breed monsters that sing or offer more to the island's music.

Thanks to it's mobile nature, it's something you can pop in for about five or ten minutes to see how your progress is going, with lots of monsters and activities to do if your willing to check out everything. Since it's release, there's PLENTY to discover and grow, so you could be here for weeks or months on end! 

However, like most of these mobile games, there will be an insane amount of grinding, waiting, and premium currency shortage that will wall you hard, thankfully it is manageable with the amount of updates they've added, but it will always be a tough sell for those who are turned off by this stuff.

It's simple, but it's extremely charming in it's presentation, growing your islands to hear the songs to their full potential, and breeding all the colorful monsters to collect! The devs are really great too with constant updates and communication, showing that they care about the community and happy to have joined the ride since 2023!

I got this to play a little with my girl (aged 4) and I hate to say this, but it is total Google Play Store slop with all the usual nausiating fecal matter attached.

Too pay to win, the amount of sneaky ways they try to get you to waste / buy more gems is inane. Game is only good for the nostalgia, and it's too bloated with various features that are too overwhelming for returning players to get into. For example, they've now added skins / accessories for the monsters as yet another way to try to squeeze money out of their players.

Every time I've tried to play this game throughout my life, I've given up on it very quickly. It's just too pay to win, the wait times are god awful, and it's just generally not fun for a casual player. It sucks because I very much like the concept and I want to explore the lore of this game, but I just can't get past how subtly paywalled everything is.

FUCK Big Blue Bubble. Retarded company doing even more retarded things. You dont even play the game off the device you DOWNLOADED THE GAME ON; you fucking play a ""projection"" of whatever is going on in their servers. Cant mod the game, cant add custom assets, sounds, nothing. Why? because it'd be a FELON. the PROFOUNDLY RETARDED company decided to host EVERYTHING from their single player, (mostly) offline, adapted mobile app from THEIR SHITTY SERVER! WHY! 

This is how I'd imagine Big Blue Bubble would respond:
"What? You don't want to wait 12 hours for a base/starter monster? You want to play the game without waiting because you want to have fun? Well, luckily for you, You can GIVE US MONEY FOR GEMS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" (Shitty mobile game trope)

Don't even get me mentioned on the mobile game. The greediest, scummiest, filthiest Israelis put that together. You have to RE-DOWNLOAD the fucking game EVERY TIME you open it. Tabbed out to message someone for 3 seconds? Redownload the whole game. Wanted to skip a song? BBB raped your media overlay on mobile so you cant even listen to music while playing with the monster-tard gilkbeasts! Redownload the Whole game again! 

Oh, wait, you redownloaded the whole game again? Took that time out of your day? Well, how about we prompt you to "Create Account" or "Log In"! where, again, we have to redownload all of your files! You only redownloaded the projection of our servers, silly goose! ""You will own nothing und be Happy!""

Fuck you, Make your game run natively like EVERY OTHER game, stop trying to be "protective" or whatnot, Nobody is going to cheat your mobile game, and even if they do, who fucking cares?

Every time I've tried to play this game throughout my life, I've given up on it very quickly. It's just too pay to win, the wait times are god awful, and it's just generally not fun for a casual player. It sucks because I very much like the concept and I want to explore the lore of this game, but I just can't get past how subtly paywalled everything is.
This game is so shit, I gambled three times on the wheel, lost all my money and didn't win anything. BTW it's not a skill issue I am usually good at gambling.
sucks cuz had to start over cuz my phone got taken away since this not appropriate for my grandpapas funeral

FUCK Big Blue Bubble. Retarded company doing even more retarded things. You dont even play the game off the device you DOWNLOADED THE GAME ON; you fucking play a ""projection"" of whatever is going on in their servers. Cant mod the game, cant add custom assets, sounds, nothing. Why? because it'd be a FELON. the PROFOUNDLY RETARDED company decided to host EVERYTHING from their single player, (mostly) offline, adapted mobile app from THEIR SHITTY SERVER! WHY! 

This is how I'd imagine Big Blue Bubble would respond:
"What? You don't want to wait 12 hours for a base/starter monster? You want to play the game without waiting because you want to have fun? Well, luckily for you, You can GIVE US MONEY FOR GEMS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" (Shitty mobile game trope)

Don't even get me mentioned on the mobile game. The greediest, scummiest, filthiest Israelis put that together. You have to RE-DOWNLOAD the fucking game EVERY TIME you open it. Tabbed out to message someone for 3 seconds? Redownload the whole game. Wanted to skip a song? BBB raped your media overlay on mobile so you cant even listen to music while playing with the monster-tard gilkbeasts! Redownload the Whole game again! 

Oh, wait, you redownloaded the whole game again? Took that time out of your day? Well, how about we prompt you to "Create Account" or "Log In"! where, again, we have to redownload all of your files! You only redownloaded the projection of our servers, silly goose! ""You will own nothing und be Happy!""

Fuck you, Make your game run natively like EVERY OTHER game, stop trying to be "protective" or whatnot, Nobody is going to cheat your mobile game, and even if they do, who fucking cares?
honestly..... Its just like every other free mobile game

Huge cash grab. You have to wait literaly years to get any progress done if you don't want to spend gems, and to get a gem farm, you need hundereds of gems which only create still a tiny amount of gems. It's stupid
Pretty boring honestly
I couldn't find out how to make the monsters sing. I hate.
No Nudity or Nazi Propaganda
just when i thought i got out they pulled me back in
at this point this game is P2P
bad game

Yeah, the songs are good, but its just too pay to win. any monster on other island takes hours to breed and incubate. and if you wanna skip the waiting time, you need to pay with gems. I like the game and music, but...please. just lower the prices [BE FREE TO PLAY MSM]
entirely separated from the mobile version. cant even add mobile friends. how hard is it to just port the damm thing or just dont have it on steam

Its to complicated I am stupid, the little gombas wont tell me anything, they just sit there singing and adding no value, where do they get that money from are they grinminmal gombas, ps where are the guns i was promised fast paced pvp and highly optimised FPS, all i recieved was some bread that i fed to the gombas
